place_description: Bookseller chain stocking housebrand eReader, plus a broad selection of titles for adults & kids.

reviews_data.review_text: Friendly service
Great

The Starbucks was wonderful! Great service and super yummy matcha

The Barnes and noble was clean and organized and lovely

Didn't have the book I was looking for (but neither did any B&N within hundreds of miles). But, they did have a good selection of Lego, and I was able to find the Nintendo Entertainment System Lego that was out of stock online in store.
Helpful staff! Some of the managers can be a little hard to approach, but overall the staff is great.
The staff here was extremely friendly in helping us find the book we were looking for. I would definitely come back.
Favorite Barnes & Noble in Charlotte because it's two stories!
Love this store. It is always busy, the staff is very helpful, but parking can be difficult. Very busy area
Excellent bookstore. Time has a Spanish section of business and finance books, I love it and a cashier, who knows a little Spanish, was very kind to me, thank you very much.
Selections were fantastic, but the standout at this store was staff. They were friendly, helpful, and knowledgeable. Kind people operating a clean, well maintained store.

I'm always happy to see a B&N...or any bookstore. This location is really nice. It's laid out very well, and it's easy to find books or whatever you're looking for. The staff has always been helpful. There's a Starbucks inside with limited seating. The tables are cafe sized tiny tables, so don't plan on spreading out any work projects. The parking lot fills up pretty quickly but if you don't mind walking there's always spaces at the back. All in all one of my favorite places to pop into just to take a break and get a cup of coffees. FYI...It's not a "normal" Starbucks as in...they don't use the app and you don't earn points. I'm not sure if you can upload a receipt or not to earn points...I've never tried.
I came here to have fun on Syd's birthday today.

Amazing Barnes and Noble location around some amazing retail and convenient to many neighborhoods. This store is two stories, has an amazing  Starbucks cafe with amazing  coffee drinks, great games section, stationary and paper, manga, children's books, and everything  book related you could possibly imagine. Tons of fun random seats to crash inTo in hidden corners too.

This location also has  handicap accessible [P] parking,  restrooms, elevator and more.
They have a great wide selection at this location
i got a warmed up cookie and strawberry acai, had a lovely conversation with the barista named richelle! would recommend this location.
Love this place!
Worst business book selection I've ever seen; geared towards driving an agenda vs selected for people who actually want knowledge
They had exactly the hat I was looking for.
Everything was clean and in order, the staff was super nice.
The store was very busy but well organized.
Comprehensive array of books including fiction, non-fiction, science, math, foreign languages, religions of the world, astronomy, self-improvement, records (classical, oldies, R&B, etc.).
Manager was not nice to the older lady at checkout helping me. And then he was wrong about the info he gave me.
Large and well organized with the usual coffee area and upstairs children's area.
Barns and nobles is an awesome place for avid readers. The sitting areas are so comfortable, go and enjoy.
Great location, selection of books, and helpful sales clerks
Ever so helpful.  A land of escapes with sweets and coffee that'll send you off to the land of imagination.  And if you're not sure what to read, staff is very knowledgeable on all things books.
Quiet & nice
Good selection. Enjoy having a coffee shop and wide selection of magazines
Me encanto
Have a good variety of books to choose from almost every genre and of course the ones I was looking for and for a very accessible prices, Definitely coming back.
Amazing selection.
Two.story . Wonderful location and layout.

Probably the first standalone location I have been at, which is nice. It's location provides a quiet ambience for reading, studying, relaxing, running away from your children, what have you. The workers are kind, motivating, and extremely helpful as when I was in search for one particular thing, she took me to several items that fit my request in different ways. Definitely my quiet place.
Very nice location..they open until late

Hey people in B&N please get people that are well aware that when we come to your store and we will look for more that a coffee at Starbucks today l got burned chicken nuggets and really get the drinks that are on your advertisement lately l don't get what l really wanted take it out of view so customers don't get excited about a drink picture that you most likely never has available and don have servers that don't know anything about what you have in the menu l think is ver disrespectful for the money we expended there all the time.
This is a smaller B and N but it has everything you need!!

Very clean and well organized. The staff was very friendly. I've been coming here often on since high school ever since Borders closed. The cafe seating area is not as cozy as it used to be, but there were a good amount of seating options.
Excellent books
One of the better Barnes and Nobles I have been to.

Popped in for some stationary but not a huge selection. Plenty of books though!  I ended up buying some cards and sat down at the (near empty) in store Starbucks to write a few notes. Great spot to hang on a hot summer day.
Had every book I was looking for and more!!! Love it!!
Friendly staff and barista at the Starbucks. No other book stores are open past 5pm even on weekends. So it was nice to have a place to get books and coffee.
My favorite bookstore natioan-wide!!
This one is a nice one with huge Starbucks.

Great experience today! The lady in the cafe was very knowledgeable about the membership program. She basically sold it for us and we joined on the spot. The lady at the regular registers was very sweet as well. She served with smile. I needed help finding a book and another young lady helped with without any hesitation. I will return!
Great place to relax and enjoy family time. Getting a coffee and finding something to read

Great location and love coming to this Barnes and Nobles! With a great selection of books, everything is organized and easy to find. They have everything from travel, cooking, spiritual to non-fiction and fiction, magazines, planners, and any and all book accessories. They have a Starbucks located inside of the store also, so you can sip on your favorite drinks and browse. All the store employees are super friendly and welcoming. They have a big parking lot with plenty of parking spaces to choose from.
Barista was good and helpful. Perfect drink to accommodate my study. Made the experience pleasant and thus placing Barnes ahead of the competition in my opinion. Books-A-Million has a lot to learn.
Staff is kind and great selection of books
Clean, well stocked. Escelator is fixed!
Super friendly staff, very helpful!
Obsessed. I could live here lol
Not sure the employee name but I went to pick up a book and she was extremely nice at the desk. Explained the rewards program and got us signed up. Great energy
Barnes & Noble
The associate was so helpful, I didn't have to raise a finger . Thank you !!
Always love a great bookstore
Great book store. Buy your books in person & support the local community before Amazon puts them all out of business!

I love the location, but I had a weird experience with one of the cashiers. I don't remember her name. My cousin and I went up to the register, and we were trying to be cordial but she barely said a word to us and gave us long, dirty stares the whole time. After I paid, she gave me the receipt, but then she crumpled up the cafe coupon right in front of me and just stood there waiting for us to leave. Like what the heck??? I don't know what the problem was, but it made me feel really judged and uncomfortable. I don't usually leave negative reviews, but I'm sure I would have gotten fired at my previous job for treating a shopper like that.

We have been to B&N all over the country. We make it a point to spend our money here when there are many other options to choose from such as Walmart, Target, etc. However, having encounters with employees like we did yesterday make us not want to revisit a particular location. We had a very serious time-constraint and upon asking the cashier where something was located she proceeded to speak over and above me in an obnoxiously slow and sarcastic tone: "annnnnnd how is your dayyyyyyy? Isn't it a looooooovely day, etc." It's one thing if you're genuinely interested in your customer's day, but this was done very rudely. Not impressed with her approach.
Incredibly rude and unprofessional customer service. If you don't like working in an environment where you're helping others with something they're passionate about, like literature, then don't.
Clean, beautiful store with friendly and helpful staff.
Poor layout of store couldn't find anything

I'm only giving the four stars and it's not their fault, but the parking was hard to get. Again it could just be the demographics and it's not really their fault but they didn't have a in my opinion big variety of Manga. overall I love Barnes & Noble's
Very helpful staff!!!

Very friendly workers across the board. Also Huge shout out to who ever Rachel is and her very informative bible version summaries. Very well done a a good help to navigating them. I will definitely come back to a store that adds such personal touches.
Excellent selection of books!  Large inventory

This is my happy place.

Update: This is still my happy place.

Update: Yep, still my happy place.
Very large, nice location

I have been a long time customer of this B&N with many fond memories of taking my children here.  I am now finding this location to be unclean, with burnt matches and food wrappers by the reading chairs  (Manager let us know it is only cleaned every other night - yuck!). Some of the cafe staff is openly rude.  When brought to the cafe manager's attention, she was uninterested.  After 30 years of shopping here, I will be transferring my business to Park Road Books.

Writing this from the parking lot of the store because I couldn't wait a second longer to emphasize how rude and unpersonable Janet M was at the cash register while I was picking up an online order. Extremely unprofessional and unhelpful.
Books are wisdom.  Thank you for being.
Pleasant atmosphere, good selection.

It's two stories with escalators and an elevator. Huge book selection, including new releases, classics, every genre imaginable, and a children's section upstairs. Vinyl records and CDs. Movies, magazines, collectibles. Comics and  Manga. Stationary, greeting cards, and more. Prices run from a little expensive to very affordable. There's something for everyone AND a Starbucks! Beats Amazon for a joyful experience (and getting some steps in) any day. Everyone was pleasant. I love this store.
Great store with relevant fashion magazines
Very nice store great employees
Great customer service and an ok selection of books.

There is nothing in the world quite like a bookstore. As much as I love, the small independent bookstore, I am also a big fan of Barnes & Noble forever!

I read someplace that the bookstore is over 150 years old. That's amazing!

My favorite sections in the store are paper, journals, & gifts. Especially their Christmas stuff.

I've also purchased some unique toys as gifts for my son & people who have just had babies and for birthdays.

I usually do a more extensive number of photos and videos, but this is all I happened to do a few days ago. It was a chance to visit to Charlotte and I made my way here.

There is such peace in reading a book, and I hope that Barnes & Noble continues to thrive in the age of digital.

Enjoy!
XO
Josephine
Excellent as always
Very helpful staff, but book selection for African Americans were very limited.
Nice two story book store! Great staff to help too!!!
Very helpful staff.
Friendly staff, great atmosphere, great selection
Nice place to find a new book or game

I love me a good bookstore & B&N never fails. Sure, I wish they competed a little more with Amazon pricing, but I understand why they can't. The staff was helpful & very nice. They helped us find everything we were looking for.
Nice store, just like any other B&N friendly staff.
Signed up for a membership.  She was so helpful when I signed up. Super friendly. Very welcoming!
Huge place, parking is tough on a Saturday
Great vibes and book selection. Location is good too, right next to the South Park Mall.
Good iced coffee at Starbucks. Good children's book selection.
See
It's a bookstore. Bookstores are nirvana to begin with; they would have to try to get less than 5 stars
Great atmosphere and good selection of books.

When looking a sudoku book, the employee took me to the place where they were and helped me find the best book. Then when looking for jigsaw puzzles the same employee took me to place where they were so I could find the best one for me. I felt well supported, going from the ground floor to the upper level.

B&N doesn't seem like a bookstore anymore, Coffee, snacks, toys, puzzles, cheap offshore books in rack after rack, trinkets  near check outs.  People eating, drinking, and thumbing through magazines an books like it's a library. They killed independent bookstores and my recent visit was proof to me that they are abandoning books, "We can order that for you!"   The clerk did confide that there are two actual bookstores let in Charlotte.  I will find them.
Interesting space and 2 floors of books etc. Escalator view of store breath-taking.
Cool
My favorite bookstore!
This is a great place to find lots of books, but I wish it had some sort of map, so you would know what to go from the beginning.
Always love browsing, sipping a coffee, and buying a new book at B & N!
The team went out of their way to help my family find a book that was not shelved correctly. A great spot.

Was very impressed. Has a second floor with escalators and a Starbucks. Book selection is very large, with lots of sale shelves that have good quality books. Big Manga section. The cashier was nice and very informative about membership. DnD section was small, but there I guess.
It was less than an hour before they closed but they were so cheerie and happy. They had amazing customer service and I love their two level store
This is a very nice B&N location. Occasionally on weekends parking can be scarce
The staff was very helpful in locating the two items we were looking to find.

One stop shop for all your book needs. They always have a wide range of selection from kids to adults and from fantasy to fiction. Always updated with newest releases in the market it's the best place to shop for books
One of the best B&N locations in the Charlotte area. Selection is always good, the store and cafe are clean, and from a customer service standpoint they appear fully staffed & willing to assist.

I recently visited Barnes and Noble in South Park and I must say, it was a truly enjoyable experience. The store had a vast selection of books across various genres, making it a paradise for book lovers like myself. The staff was incredibly helpful and friendly, readily available to assist me in finding the books I was looking for. The ambiance of the store was cozy and inviting, creating the perfect atmosphere for browsing and reading. Overall, Barnes and Noble in South Park is a haven for book enthusiasts, and I highly recommend paying a visit for a memorable literary experience.
Lots of selection, good layout, and helpful employees.
It's a good bookstore, but there were two things they said they had in stocks, but neither they nor I could find it, which was annoying.
They didn't have my book in stock, but they ordered it for me, and I didn't have to pay until I picked it up. The wait time was acceptable, the store is clean, and the staff are friendly and helpful.

I wish there were more Barnes & Noble. It is a pleasure to go there, and see the large selection of good books, toys, magazines, and many other things. You can also enjoy a cup of coffee while you read a good book.

Stuck queuing for ages. Spent 15 minutes waiting to even be acknowledged at the cafe, then when nobody was at the circulation desk I had to wait another 10 minutes just to find out they didn't have the book I was looking for.

Also the bathrooms were dirty.
A very knowledgeable staff person talked with me about my genre preferences. Then she made several helpful suggestions .
Beautifully large Barnes & Noble store with an extensive selection of books, magazines & merchandise! Come prepared to browse!

Any book lovers, this is a paradise. I was very much happy with their collection ranging from fiction to science books. I picked up quite a few books even though I would be traveling back home.

Their stem toys section was also great. They have some board puzzle games as well. I did pick their National geographic games and VEX robot builder for my 9 year old kid.
Very nice place
Really kind and helpful workers, good selection
Excellent service.  They had the I book wanted. It was pulled and reserved for purchase upon my arrival. A little caveat, remind cashier of the store's online price; save some $$.
Who doesn't love a good book store that is open and well lit and chuck full of goodness.  Always the loveliest and most knowledgeable staff.
Love this location, staff super friendly and helpful.
No one helped, or they pretended I wasn't there.
A real bookstore near home where kids can spend time unplugged. Coffee, books, and something for everyone.
It is a comfortable environment.  I was able to get what I was looking for.
Great customer service, very welcoming and clean, and most importantly great selection of books.

I have visited this library for many years. I have always loved it. Well located (some things to do at Birkdale), with kind attendants and coffee inside... I only regret that they thinned up their holdings, but I understand that B&N had to do that in all their stores in order to keep up with online book stores... Still, a good library, and the only hope for those who live in Northern Charlotte
It's a great version of the Barnes and Noble. I still prefer Park Road Books though.
Great store
Great store.

Do you like book shops? Great places to find a good book on a rainy day or places to grab a cup of coffee and escape into a novel for a while. Upstairs is wonderful for kiddos and they also allow well behaving dogs of all sizes.
This is definitely one of the best Barnes and Noble in Charlotte!
The workers were very friendly.  The two books that I wanted were found easily.

Horrible lady at the register, handed my card to her when she asked if that's a debit card and she threw it at me instead of handing it to me. I paid with my debit card and she said I had no choice but to get cash back when doing a return. I told her I don't do cash and she said to take to the bank. Management should really do something.
2/17/23
2:30pm
Great coffee and a quiet place. Definitely worth stopping by and walking around.
Super clean with a nice layout. They are a couple of seating areas throughout as well as a Starbucks to grab a coffee.
Good place

Barnes and Noble as the store was great! The cashier was not so great. Acted like I had 3 heads and made a face when I told him I had cash. Then when giving me my change, he would not even put it in my hand, he set it on the counter. Then asked me if I wanted a bag. I bought a bunch of books, of course I want a bag.

An employee told me that there are "some cards" you cannot get money back on. If it's not a gift card, I don't understand how you can't put money back on my card if you aren't planning to give me cash. Why would I want you to give me a gift card, if I paid with a debit card? Makes zero sense.
This is a very nice Barnes and Noble!  Has comfy chairs!!

Although these stores a slowly bleeding out, this one is a great example of why they're important. Young folks everywhere, reading books and hanging out at the cafe - families browsing the stacks. It's well run, clean, and nicely stocked. The only gripe is the parking but there is plenty if you're willing to walk a bit.

Literally the friendliest "big book store" I've been to ever! The displays drew me in immediately without coming across as condescending which I find for most book stores. Loved the whole place and I took my time. I didn't just leave with one book; I left with 3 and a planner...Jeff was so so lovely and friendly. Makes me definitely want to go back once I've gotten through these books. Happy and friendly place and positive vibes all around.
perfect atmosphere for reading and studying, also good staff
This location is very spacious and inviting. A really nice environment in which to browse and shop. Friendly and helpful staff.
Wonderful bookstore!!!! Great variety, cozy atmosphere.
Regular run of the mill Barnes and Noble. The sometimes have trouble keeping things in stock...

The store is in complete disarray.  I was looking for a specific magazine, and the employee told me they had not unpacked the boxes.  Came back two days later and approached two employees standing around talking.  They pointed to some boxes and said they still weren't unpacked.  I asked if it was possible for anyone to open the box and grab me a copy.  They said they were too busy.

I went online and received a discounted annual magazine subscription through Amazon.  I also purchased two books while I was on the site.  It's easy to see why brick-and-mortar stores fail when they provide such poor customer service.

It was my second time going to a Barnes and Noble. I love the wide variety of books that they have, ready to satisfy all kinds of readers. The employees we talked to were very nice too and everything was well organized and clean.
Great store with a big selection, only downside is that parking is always difficult, which I think is just a result of being at this location.
Not a lot of Urban novels but still a lot of books.
This Barnes & Noble is excellent. The staff is very attentive and helpful. My daughter enjoys perusing the young reader section. I always recommend books from Barnes & Noble
Beautiful store and selection! Parking was not great, had to park a long way from the store. Long line to check out and not enough help. The employees I encountered were very nice.

A lovely bookstore with a friendly and helpful staff.  I've had to wait a few minutes at the customer service desk, but only because it was a busy time or the clerk was off helping another customer.  And they've always been very thorough whenever I've asked for help with finding something.  Also love the Baristas at the Cafe. An all around great place to go!
Very helpful staff. Clean building and it's near and organized. If they can't help you someone most definitely can.
I love the 2 story B&N locations. Best one in 100 miles of me.
So nice place
Great clearance section for kids books.
Did not find the How to Buy a House Book...will have to order it. Great coffee treat while browsing.
Beautiful and inviting environment for readers
Great staff

Great selection and help if needed.
A whole rack of books various subjects for $3.00.
Plus coffee etc

Location Sharon and Colony.
My wife was shopping for a specific calendar.  The clerk was unduly snooty.  The clerk very clearly made erroneous judgements regarding comparative socio-economic status.    Sad.
Great selection
Always a great selection of books and the cafe has a great selection
Many books to see and read. If you like buying and reading books then it is the place for you.

B&B is my favorite spot. Great books.
Only one suggestion. The seats are dirty.
Nice-sized barnes & noble. Good selection of books and games
Always super clean and in order! I drive about 40 minutes to come here and it's definitely worth the drive!
What else is there to say!!  It's books baby!!!

This Barnes & Nobles is fantastic. I whent in looking for a book, that despite my doubts, I was really hoping they would have in stock. The book is Neil Gaiman's Coraline. My friend and I were immediately greeted my a worker upon our entrance. She quickly found the book, and politely directed us to the 2nd floor to retrieve it. We got a little lost looking for it, and of course in true book shopping fashion, ended up filling our arms with more find than we were aiming for. We even found ATEEZ' most recent EP (ATEEZ THE WORLD EP.1 :MOVEMENT)! I was pretty excited, after purchasing all our finds; we spent the afternoon unboxing our albums and reading though a few books; before checking out their vinyl collection then heading out. It was a great trip to the boom store, the are is lovely and honestly, I couldn't imagine a better time!
This store is gorgeous and it has 2 levels! The staff members are helpful and welcoming!
Excellent customer service and good selection for books.
You can read, have, coffee enjoy. Sales people are wonderful

I bought too many things due to their ability to have all the right books, games, and puzzles for anyone and everyone to enjoy. I will absolutly come here again! (Once I finished all the books I bought! )
Best place to find gifts for everyone.
Great service!
Very decent for Charlotte
Really nice store in a great location near other places to shop or eat. Nice layout and Staff seem friendly. Decent size parking in front.
Great employee's! Tight parking, worth the great selections of books!
Love this bookstore!!!

Very clean and quiet with a wide selection of books on two floors. Would be nice to see their religion section expand with more Eastern Religion selections. Five shelves of content do not do the wealth of knowledge available justice.

Very nice bookstore with overwhelming options to choose from. They only had one book I wanted but were happy to put the other on hold for me & they called me when it was ready. Not many people inside, more of a community feel (which was great to me). Customer service was very nice about helping me locate what I needed; clean bathroom.

I was at Barnes,,&,,,nobles today get some books. I have a Starbucks gift card I purchased  from Starbucks  in afton  ridge in concord for 60.00 they informed  me I couldn't  use my gift card at there store at the Starbucks.  I was exestimley   UPSET. I called Starbucks customer service  line no answer. Why didn't Barnes and nobles take my card. Wsiting on answer from them.
Love this library very much with collection of books and toys of different age groups!!
Very knowledgeable staff. Clean area to read and hang out
It's Barnes & Noble
It has pretty amazing books, their vinyl collection is kind of lacking though
The best one I have been to.
Friendly service, books are spaced out over two floors, lots of room for sitting and sipping coffee.
This location has a nice flow of categories and privacy for reading.
Wonderful staff and they always have fun displays that help me discover new authors
Friendly, courteous staff that were very helpful. Nice atmosphere including a cafe
Wonderful ambiance. Knowledgeable and helpful staff. So many great selections. New to the area and loved finding this spot. Will definitely be back.
Es uno de mis favoritos lugares para disfrutar un cafe . Y buscar de entre sus variadas colecciones de libros  y revistas. Adional, tambien buena musica . Lo recomiendo

Very clean, and big. Not very customer service oriented. Not saying that it really should be considering the fact that it's self-serving. Just not what I hoped it would be especially since it had a coffee shop. I thought CSRs would be walking around giving suggestions or opinions about book titles. Greeting customers, I mean it's South Charlotte things are usually pretty upscale on that side of town. Cashier could have been a little friendlier. Nothing makes a customer feel welcomed like a smile. I definitely recommend you check this location out. Great selection.
Great selection.
The store is very clean and well stocked.  Excellent selection.
Customer service was outstanding . HOWEVER NEARLY IMPOSSIBLE TO FIND A PLACE TO PARK
Books!

Busy location, there was room to social distance which is awesome due to the pandemic. I was having trouble locating a Kevin Hart book and the receptionist was able to help find that book quickly. Great experience here
First visit to this location. It was a pleasant experience. The one associate I encountered was friendly
They have loads of books and little gifts for everyone.
Website said holiday hours were until 9pm but they closed at 7pm. No one was there to apologize or acknowledge the discrepancy, no note on door. Very disappointed.

Great experience. Parking a little challenging.
However, staff was patient, courteous, and helpful despite the busy holiday season.
Prices high don't want to go upstairs to look at books. I am a senior
Great books and great gifts!  Barnes &Noble is a Charlotte treasure.

I  live walking distance. Came in for some Starbucks coffee. Who knew they had SOUP AND SANDWICHES? Reasonably priced. Dog Friendly. Good magazine section. Gifts and books. Hope this place does not go out of business anytime soon.
Friendly staff were helpful and seemed happy to be there.
A great bookstore is a marvelous gift!
One of my favorite locations
Good selection of books and gifts in a great location.
Very friendly, helpful employees! Nice place to drink coffee, read a book. Nice clean, quiet place!

Was looking for a book that because I wanted to know what the inside looked like They ended up not having in stock, but one of the employees (I wish I would have looked at her name) was exceptionally helpful. She was familiar with it and able to find one similar and explain what it looked like. And then went out of her way to try to find a location where it might be in stock.
Everybody was so nice and all the books are in perfect condition and they're all in order. the people that work there are so nice. And it's a super good place to work and study.
Great bookstore. Clean, organized, best selections
So disappointed that they were remodeling.  Terrible time of year. Asked a staff member how long it would take. He shrugged, didn't have a clue.

Barnes and Noble our favorite  bookstore in Charlotte NC.
Always a great experience.
Great selection, awesome customer service, so very very helpful ... and the Starbucks in this location was top notch, so yummy
Staff were friendly and kinda professional

Clean, friendly staff and has a Starbucks inside. The toilet is located upstairs and could have been cleaner but it was well stocked.

Starbucks inside - it is what you expect from visiting a Starbucks. Only had one staff person working there when I went but she was efficient and didn't screw up my drink which has happened before at other locations.

The store has little books and seats for you to read. The selection was decent in each section and what you can't get, you can order online and have it delivered.

I would go here again.

Has books.
Has coffee.
Will always push the discount card
Amazing customer service good people good smiles

I love to frequent this barnes and noble. Its huuuge compared to the one on Pineville Matthew's rd in the Arboretum. It's 2 stories! They have tons of books to choose from and the staff are always so helpful and lovely! Definitely recommend checking this B&N out!

Love this Barnes and Noble, also really love the Starbucks inside. I believe the worker I always encounter is named Dannielle and she is always working so hard but also super pleasant every time, she takes long lines in stride and she's a wonderful employee Thank you, Danielle
Great atmosphere
Books may save us all.
Excellent customer service
Wife likes this bookstore, coffee bar took a minite and the nice chairs were right next to a trash can... Employees and customers were pleasant to be around
This is a wonderful shop!!
Drink delicious coffee while they shop for books, the concept is copies by every book store at this point but it works!

I'm a big fan of the 2 story Barnes and Nobles. I don't feel crowded while I'm looking at books. Feels cozy, yet wide open if that makes sense. They have a nice deli area and a large selection of writing 'things' like pens, journals, bookmarks, cards, calendars, etc...Everything was neat and clean and smelled like coffee. Excellent selection of books from all genres. Decent selection of board games too. The only part of the store that felt a teensy bit like it didn't fit was the large movie area. It just felt like a huge space that was not very full. The cashier was super friendly and kind. All in all, great experience. Oh and parking was easy!
ES UN  JARDIN ALLI MI HIJO SE VOLVIO ADICTO A LA LECTURA ....GRACIAS

Zhe Shu Dian Gen Hao Jiu Yi Qian De Yin Xiang Xiang Tong 
Suo Yi Gu Ke Ye Shi Hen Shao 
Xiang Zhu Kai Dian Fang Zu  Leng Qi  Yuan Gong  Shu Ji 
Lian Suo Jiu Shi Ba Qi  Bu Guan Zen Yang 
Xue Ri Ben Jing Zhi  Xue Cheng Pin Duo Yuan 
Wang Lu  Shi Ti  Chong Ji ......
My favorite book store hands down, and the staff is always so nice.

Had not been here for years due to health issues, but my goddaughter is an avid reader. She wanted some quality time AT B&N, so off we went. It was well worth the visit, customer centered service. Nice to have a place where we can still touch the books, flip through a few pages and that smell that only book lovers can appreciate.
Everyone so nice and extremely helpful.

This barnes and noble is big and they do have a large variety of material. However they are running with very low staff so if you need help finding a book it can take a while. Check out lines can also be pretty long and slow to get through since there is only ever 1 cashier.

There was no one at customer service.
When the cashier asked "Did you find anything you need?" I said no and even though I told her what book I didn't find
she ignored me.
Honestly, the best barnes and noble I've ever been to. Staff is so nice, both in the book store and Starbucks. The place is always organized and neat.
It's always friendly and clean. And the employees a very nice and professional. Great place to visit and relax and enjoy the quiet.
Helpful, friendly staff helped me** find the 4fperfect gift for a two year old.
Books are in chaos.  No order and very difficult to locate.  Zero staff to ask for assistance.

I love Barnes & Nobles! It is a joy to be there. 
I'm an avid reader and own more shows than clothes so I'm totally biased! 

I do have to say the books are still very expensive, so sometimes I'd see a book that I have marked for shopping at Amazon  for twice as much. 
But it's such a nice place to hang out and their in store coffee shop has been my replacement for Starbucks since the pandemic started
I'm glad that this store survived.  Nice selection, great customer service.
The staff friendly, and the location is great. They have that unmistakable bookstore smell which I love. Go in, grab a coffee, and get lost in literature

I was just in your South Park store located in Charlotte NC where I had the worse experience ever at a Barnes and noble store. A lady by the name of Cynthia was assisting me and was very sweet and helpful. She apparently needed some assistance and called for help and at that point an associate showed up told her to cancel out of her screen and through the book at me and said here you can go now! Her attitude belonged at a fast food restaurant where that kind of service is expected! My entire interaction with this associate was beyond horrible and I expect in today's time you need to be able to keep your customers! With the way I was treated by this associate I will not return to that store! The store manager Michael attempted to handle the situation and provided me with your district manager contact info. I highly suggest putting your employee through a customer service class so she learns how to interact in a civilized manner!!
Great bookstore
Not bad
Very helpful staff. Teacher discount was a bonus!
The best in Southpark! I love walking here with my kids, they love going to pick out new books! Great staff! Very clean, and wonderful atmosphere!
I love barnes and noble. Wonderful books, magazines and cafe. Helpful and pleasant employees. Would love to see more vegan and other dietary specific items in the cafe.
Helpful staff
